            <h1 style="color: #ffffff; font-size: 20px;">Classic American Muscle Cars for Sale with Worldwide Shipping of Collectible Hot Rods</h1>
            <br />
            <table width="680">
                <tbody>
                    <tr>
                        <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><span style="color: #ffffff;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal;">American Classic Car Sales strives to offer you a unique experience of owning that vintage collectable car or truck you have been searching for. Maybe you spotted that special dream machine at a car show, rally or an exotic antique car auction but didn't realize how much you wanted it.<br />
                        <br />
                        Some classic car enthusiasts go down memory lane thinking of those old rides in hot rods and muscle cars. Remember when you last saw a GTO, Charger or 65 Mustang? You put it in your memory bank, didn&rsquo;t you?<br />
                        <br />
                        Our passion for assisting you purchase the premier classic vehicle you have been seeking is unsurpassed. We scan the world for the automotive cream of the crop, low riders, Shelbys, Mustangs, Mo-Par, Camaros and Corvettes.</span><br />
                        </span></td>
                        <td style="width: 20px;"><span style="color: #ffffff;">&nbsp;</span></td>
                        <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; color: #ffffff;">Whether, it&rsquo;s a Buick Roadster or Excalibur, you can be assured that our staff has hand picked each and every classic car to our stringent principles.<br />
                        <br />
                        Our website will enhance your vintage automotive appetite for car shows, articles and reviews. Plus, our deals on wheels, photo ads and consignment car opportunities will get your motor running. The majority of our inventory hit the streets with unmatched design curves and run with un-restricted horsepower.&nbsp;<br />
                        <br />
                        Our staff at American Classic Car Sales has a combined knowledge of the vintage classic car industry of over 100 years. Our friendly sales people can assist the fussiest of clients and answer all questions. No request is too outrageous and we will always supply additional images upon request.<br />
                        <br />
                        Of course we ship worldwide and financing is available. Now, join us as we take you down memory lane to happy days scooping the loop in American Classic Cars.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>
            <br />
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
<p style="text-align: left;">&nbsp;</p>

function validateEmail(email) { 
  var re = /^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+)*)|(\".+\"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;        
  return re.test(email);
} 

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
  if (days) {
    var date = new Date();
    date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
  }
  else var expires = "";
  document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + "; path=/";
}

function getCookie(c_name) {
  if (document.cookie.length > 0) {
    c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(c_name + "=");
    if (c_start != -1) {
      c_start = c_start + c_name.length + 1;
      c_end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", c_start);
      if (c_end == -1) {
        c_end = document.cookie.length;
      }
      return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start, c_end));
    }
  }
  return "";
}
